title: DeliverEase
description: Developed DeliverEase, a web and mobile app for seamless ordering and delivery, integrating real-time tracking and secure payments.

title: Employee late management
description: Developed Delay Management, an app for tracking employee performance and automating delay reporting, reducing manual work by one-third.

title: Fitness exercices
description: Designed a responsive fitness app with exercise filtering, detailed views, and seamless integration of data from two APIs for an enhanced user experience.

title: Ecommerce
description: Developed a full-stack eCommerce platform using MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), featuring secure authentication, product management, cart functionality.
